word: Again I say, Rejoice in the Lord. Weave Jesus into your daily experience and rest in Him. His power as a helper you need, and you may have it. Go forward firmly, valiantly, courageously. You may err in judgment, but do not lose your hold on Jesus.--Letter 8, 1886, pp. 2,3,7-10. (To J. H. Kellogg, July 16, 1886.)
